title: Color Reflection Invariance and Monopole Condensation in QCD
abstract: The quantum instability of the Savvidy-Nielsen-Olesen (SNO) vacuum of the one-loop effective action of SU(2) QCD is due to the lack of gauge invariance. We prove that the gauge invariance, in particular the color reflection invariance, restores the stability of the SNO vacuum, and thus guarantees the stability of the magnetic condensation in QCD.
